strong.span: The Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) continues to create cause for concern in the United States and abroad. The Firelands Local Schools will be implementing distance learning until approximately May 1, 2020.
Parents and guardians are instructed to visit the
to read updated communications from the district.

div.span: Grag and Go Food Bags Offered

br.span: Firelands Food Service continues to offer Grab and Go Food Bags for students who receive meal assistance. Please contine reading for additional information.
Kindergarten Registration: Online enrollment is available. Please see this webpage for additional information.
Links go live at 7:30 a.m. on Monday Feb. 3

div.span: This anonymous tip line will accept both calls and texts 24 hours a day. This service allows both students and adults to share information regarding any safety concerns with school officials and law enforcement. Click on the picture above for more information.
